input_args.passage: 'The Lord of the Rings | The Lord of the Rings is an epic high-fantasy novel by the English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien. Set in Middle-earth, the story began as a sequel to ...'
input_args.claim: "Tolkien, is an English writer who is famous for his children's book 'The Hobbit' and his epic fantasy 'The Lord of the Rings'."
